divs: sighting detailsfirst sighted in 2004 from our front porch. we noticed a very bright light hight up on the island. we watched it for about ten minutes until the light went out. i took a look with my binoculars to see what had made the light & i saw a disc like craft. i took a few pictures [not featured because they have been lost] & by the time i set the camera down, it had disappeared without a trace. the photos featured here were taken in early 2005 on a boat. this marked the third or fourth time i had seen the light in the area. it seems to have some interest in the island. it tends to be stay the same area, but higher or lower. more recently [as in two weeks ago], we spotted it again at sea level. i managed to take a picture, but it is not visible. which is odd because the light was quite visible. each sighting is ten to fifteen minutes in length. there is no sound & the craft does not move. it does appear in different spots around the island\bay. it has appeared at several different times during the day. i have only seen it in its non illuminated [disc] form once. if i had to estimate, i would say that it has been spotted at least six times by either myself or a family member. i'll submit more info\pics next time we see it.
Summary: Bright light hangs around Lummi island/Bellingham bay.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bellingham
There were no other sightings in Bellingham on or around February 7th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
